1 -- Routers.hs
    2 
    3 module Strappy.Routers where
    4 
    5 import Strappy.Type
    6 import Strappy.CL
    7 import Strappy.Expr
    8 import qualified Strappy.CombMap  as CM
    9 
   10 
   11 -- | define some oft used type variables
   12 t = mkTVar 0
   13 t0 = mkTVar 0 
   14 t1 = mkTVar 1
   15 t2 = mkTVar 2
   16 t3 = mkTVar 3
   17 t4 = mkTVar 4
   18 t5 = mkTVar 5
   19 t6 = mkTVar 6
   20 t7 = mkTVar 7
   21 t8 = mkTVar 8
   22 
   23 -- router lib
   24 routers = one_routers `CM.union` two_routers `CM.union` three_routers
   25                   
   26 
   27 one_routers = CM.fromList 
   28           $ [(cName c, c) | c <- [cS, cC, cB]]
   29 two_routers = CM.fromList 
   30               $ [(cName c, c) | c <- [cSS, cSB, cSC, 
   31                   cBS, cBB, cBC, cCS, cCB, cCC]]
   32 three_routers = CM.fromList 
   33           $ [(cName c, c) | c <- ternaryRouters]
   34 
   35 
   36 -- convenience definations
   37 infixl 4 <+>
   38 (<+>) = App 
   39 
   40 cS = CLeaf "S" (Func $ \f ->
   41                 Func $ \g -> 
   42                 Func $ \x ->
   43                 (f <+> x ) <+> (g <+> x)) tp
   44      where tp = (t2 ->- t1 ->- t0) ->- (t2 ->- t1) ->- t2 ->- t0
   45 
   46 cB = CLeaf "B" (Func $ \f ->
   47                 Func $ \g -> 
   48                 Func $ \x ->
   49                 f <+> (g <+> x)) tp
   50      where tp = (t1 ->- t) ->- (t2 ->- t1) ->- t2 ->- t
   51 
   52 cC = CLeaf "C" (Func $ \f ->
   53                 Func $ \g -> 
   54                 Func $ \x ->
   55                 (f <+> x ) <+> g) tp
   56      where tp = (t1 ->- t2 ->- t) ->- t2 ->- t1 ->- t 
   57 
   58 cSS = CLeaf "SS" (Func $ \f ->
   59                 Func $ \g -> 
   60                 Func $ \x1 ->
   61                 Func $ \x2 ->
   62                 (f <+> x1 <+> x2 ) <+> (g <+> x1 <+> x2)) tp
   63      where tp = (t2 ->- t3 ->- t1 ->- t) ->- (t2 ->- t3 ->- t1) ->- t2 ->- t3 ->- t
   64 
   65 cSB = CLeaf "SB" (Func $ \f ->
   66                   Func $ \g -> 
   67                   Func $ \x1 ->
   68                   Func $ \x2 ->
   69                   (f <+> x1 ) <+> (g <+> x1 <+> x2)) tp
   70      where tp = (t2 ->- t1 ->- t) ->- (t2 ->- t3 ->- t1) ->- t2 ->- t3 ->- t
   71 cSC = CLeaf "SC" (Func $ \f ->
   72                 Func $ \g -> 
   73                 Func $ \x1 ->
   74                 Func $ \x2 ->
   75                 (f <+> x1 <+> x2 ) <+> (g <+> x1)) tp
   76      where tp = (t3 ->- t1 ->- t2 ->- t) ->- (t3 ->- t2) ->- t3 ->- t1 ->- t
   77 
   78 cBS = CLeaf "BS" (Func $ \f ->
   79                 Func $ \g -> 
   80                 Func $ \x1 ->
   81                 Func $ \x2 ->
   82                 (f <+> x2 ) <+> (g <+> x1 <+> x2)) tp
   83      where tp = (t3 ->- t1 ->- t) ->- (t2 ->- t3 ->- t1) ->- t2 ->- t3 ->- t
   84 
   85 cBB = CLeaf "BB" (Func $ \f ->
   86                 Func $ \g -> 
   87                 Func $ \x1 ->
   88                 Func $ \x2 ->
   89                 f <+> (g <+> x1 <+> x2)) tp
   90      where tp = (t1 ->- t) ->- (t2 ->- t3 ->- t1) ->- t2 ->- t3 ->- t
   91 
   92 cBC = CLeaf "BC" (Func $ \f ->
   93                 Func $ \g -> 
   94                 Func $ \x1 ->
   95                 Func $ \x2 ->
   96                 (f <+> x2) <+> (g <+> x1)) tp
   97      where tp = (t1 ->- t2 ->- t) ->- (t3 ->- t2) ->- t3 ->- t1 ->- t
   98 
   99 cCS = CLeaf "CS" (Func $ \f ->
  100                   Func $ \g -> 
  101                   Func $ \x1 ->
  102                   Func $ \x2 ->
  103                   (f <+> x1 <+> x2) <+> (g <+> x2)) tp
  104      where tp = (t1 ->- t3 ->- t2 ->- t) ->- (t3 ->- t2) ->- t1 ->- t3 ->- t
  105 
  106 cCB = CLeaf "CB" (Func $ \f ->
  107                 Func $ \g -> 
  108                 Func $ \x1 ->
  109                 Func $ \x2 ->
  110                 (f <+> x1) <+> (g <+> x2)) tp
  111      where tp = (t1 ->- t2 ->- t) ->- (t3 ->- t2) ->- t1 ->- t3 ->- t
  112 
  113 cCC = CLeaf "CC" (Func $ \f ->
  114                 Func $ \g -> 
  115                 Func $ \x1 ->
  116                 Func $ \x2 ->
  117                 (f <+> x1 <+> x2) <+> (g)) tp
  118      where tp = (t1 ->- t2 ->- t3 ->- t) ->- t3 ->- t1 ->- t2 ->- t
  119 
  120 cSSS = CLeaf "SSS" (Func $ \f ->
  121                 Func $ \g -> 
  122                 Func $ \x1 ->
  123                 Func $ \x2 ->
  124                 Func $ \x3 ->
  125                 (f <+> x1 <+> x2 <+> x3) <+> (g <+> x1 <+> x2 <+> x3)) tp
  126      where tp = (t2 ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t1 ->- t)
  127               ->- (t2 ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t1) ->- t2 ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t
  128 
  129 cSSB = CLeaf "SSB" (Func $ \f ->
  130                 Func $ \g -> 
  131                 Func $ \x1 ->
  132                 Func $ \x2 ->
  133                 Func $ \x3 ->
  134                 (f <+> x1 <+> x2 <+> x3) <+> (g <+> x1 <+> x2 )) tp
  135      where tp = (t3 ->- t4 ->- t1 ->- t2 ->- t)
  136               ->- (t3 ->- t4 ->- t2) ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t1 ->- t
  137 
  138 cSSC = CLeaf "SSC" (Func $ \f ->
  139                 Func $ \g -> 
  140                 Func $ \x1 ->
  141                 Func $ \x2 ->
  142                 Func $ \x3 ->
  143                 (f <+> x1 <+> x2 ) <+> (g <+> x1 <+> x2 <+> x3 )) tp
  144      where tp = (t2 ->- t3 ->- t1 ->- t)
  145               ->- (t2 ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t1) ->- t2 ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t
  146 
  147 
  148 cSBS = CLeaf "SBS" (Func $ \f ->
  149                 Func $ \g -> 
  150                 Func $ \x1 ->
  151                 Func $ \x2 ->
  152                 Func $ \x3 ->
  153                 (f <+> x1 <+> x2 <+> x3) <+> (g <+> x1 <+> x3 )) tp
  154     where tp = (t3 ->- t1 ->- t4 ->- t2 ->- t)
  155              ->- (t3 ->- t4 ->- t2) ->- t3 ->- t1 ->- t4 ->- t
  156 
  157 cSBB = CLeaf "SBB" (Func $ \f ->
  158                 Func $ \g -> 
  159                 Func $ \x1 ->
  160                 Func $ \x2 ->
  161                 Func $ \x3 ->
  162                 (f <+> x1 <+> x2 <+> x3) <+> (g <+> x1 )) tp
  163      where tp =  (t4 ->- t1 ->- t2 ->- t3 ->- t) ->- (t4 ->- t3) ->- t4 ->- t1 ->- t2 ->- t
  164 
  165 cSBC = CLeaf "SBC" (Func $ \f ->
  166                 Func $ \g -> 
  167                 Func $ \x1 ->
  168                 Func $ \x2 ->
  169                 Func $ \x3 ->
  170                 (f <+> x1 <+> x2) <+> (g <+> x1 <+> x3 )) tp
  171      where tp = (t3 ->- t1 ->- t2 ->- t) ->- (t3 ->- t4 ->- t2) ->- t3 ->- t1 ->- t4 ->- t
  172 
  173 cSCS = CLeaf "SCS" (Func $ \f ->
  174                 Func $ \g -> 
  175                 Func $ \x1 ->
  176                 Func $ \x2 ->
  177                 Func $ \x3 ->
  178                 (f <+> x1 <+> x3) <+> (g <+> x1 <+> x2 <+> x3 )) tp
  179      where tp = (t2 ->- t4 ->- t1 ->- t)
  180               ->- (t2 ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t1) ->- t2 ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t
  181 
  182 cSCB = CLeaf "SCB" (Func $ \f ->
  183                 Func $ \g -> 
  184                 Func $ \x1 ->
  185                 Func $ \x2 ->
  186                 Func $ \x3 ->
  187                 (f <+> x1 <+> x3) <+> (g <+> x1 <+> x2  )) tp
  188      where tp = (t3 ->- t1 ->- t2 ->- t) ->- (t3 ->- t4 ->- t2) ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t1 ->- t
  189 
  190 
  191 cSCC = CLeaf "SCC" (Func $ \f ->
  192                 Func $ \g -> 
  193                 Func $ \x1 ->
  194                 Func $ \x2 ->
  195                 Func $ \x3 ->
  196                 (f <+> x1) <+> (g <+> x1 <+> x2 <+> x3  )) tp
  197      where tp = (t2 ->- t1 ->- t) ->- (t2 ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t1) ->- t2 ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t
  198 
  199 cBSS = CLeaf "BSS" (Func $ \f ->
  200                 Func $ \g -> 
  201                 Func $ \x1 ->
  202                 Func $ \x2 ->
  203                 Func $ \x3 ->
  204                 (f <+> x1 <+> x2 <+> x3) <+> (g  <+> x2 <+> x3  )) tp
  205      where tp = (t1 ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t2 ->- t)
  206               ->- (t3 ->- t4 ->- t2) ->- t1 ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t
  207 
  208 cBSB = CLeaf "BSB" (Func $ \f ->
  209                 Func $ \g -> 
  210                 Func $ \x1 ->
  211                 Func $ \x2 ->
  212                 Func $ \x3 ->
  213                 (f <+> x1 <+> x2 <+> x3) <+> (g  <+> x2   )) tp
  214      where tp = (t1 ->- t4 ->- t2 ->- t3 ->- t) ->- (t4 ->- t3) ->- t1 ->- t4 ->- t2 ->- t
  215 
  216 cBSC = CLeaf "BSC" (Func $ \f ->
  217                 Func $ \g -> 
  218                 Func $ \x1 ->
  219                 Func $ \x2 ->
  220                 Func $ \x3 ->
  221                 (f <+> x1 <+> x2 ) <+> (g  <+> x2 <+> x3   )) tp
  222      where tp = (t1 ->- t3 ->- t2 ->- t) ->- (t3 ->- t4 ->- t2) ->- t1 ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t
  223 
  224 cBBS = CLeaf "BBS" (Func $ \f ->
  225                 Func $ \g -> 
  226                 Func $ \x1 ->
  227                 Func $ \x2 ->
  228                 Func $ \x3 ->
  229                 (f <+> x1 <+> x2 <+> x3 ) <+> (g  <+> x3   )) tp
  230      where tp = (t1 ->- t2 ->- t4 ->- t3 ->- t) ->- (t4 ->- t3) ->- t1 ->- t2 ->- t4 ->- t
  231 
  232 cBBB = CLeaf "BBB" (Func $ \f ->
  233                 Func $ \g -> 
  234                 Func $ \x1 ->
  235                 Func $ \x2 ->
  236                 Func $ \x3 ->
  237                 (f <+> x1 <+> x2 <+> x3 ) <+> g ) tp
  238      where tp = (t1 ->- t2 ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t) ->- t4 ->- t1 ->- t2 ->- t3 ->- t
  239 
  240 
  241 cBBC = CLeaf "BBC" (Func $ \f ->
  242                 Func $ \g -> 
  243                 Func $ \x1 ->
  244                 Func $ \x2 ->
  245                 Func $ \x3 ->
  246                 (f <+> x1 <+> x2  ) <+> (g <+> x3) ) tp
  247      where tp = (t1 ->- t2 ->- t3 ->- t) ->- (t4 ->- t3) ->- t1 ->- t2 ->- t4 ->- t
  248 
  249 cBCS = CLeaf "BCS" (Func $ \f ->
  250                 Func $ \g -> 
  251                 Func $ \x1 ->
  252                 Func $ \x2 ->
  253                 Func $ \x3 ->
  254                 (f <+> x1 <+> x3  ) <+> (g <+> x2 <+> x3) ) tp
  255      where tp = (t1 ->- t4 ->- t2 ->- t) ->- (t3 ->- t4 ->- t2) ->- t1 ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t
  256 
  257 cBCB = CLeaf "BCB" (Func $ \f ->
  258                 Func $ \g -> 
  259                 Func $ \x1 ->
  260                 Func $ \x2 ->
  261                 Func $ \x3 ->
  262                 (f <+> x1 <+> x3  ) <+> (g <+> x2) ) tp
  263      where tp = (t1 ->- t2 ->- t3 ->- t) ->- (t4 ->- t3) ->- t1 ->- t4 ->- t2 ->- t
  264 
  265 cBCC = CLeaf "BCC" (Func $ \f ->
  266                 Func $ \g -> 
  267                 Func $ \x1 ->
  268                 Func $ \x2 ->
  269                 Func $ \x3 ->
  270                 (f <+> x1   ) <+> (g <+> x2 <+> x3) ) tp
  271      where tp = (t1 ->- t2 ->- t) ->- (t3 ->- t4 ->- t2) ->- t1 ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t
  272 
  273 cCSS = CLeaf "CSS" (Func $ \f ->
  274                 Func $ \g -> 
  275                 Func $ \x1 ->
  276                 Func $ \x2 ->
  277                 Func $ \x3 ->
  278                 (f <+> x2 <+> x3   ) <+> (g <+> x1 <+> x2 <+> x3) ) tp
  279      where tp = (t3 ->- t4 ->- t1 ->- t)
  280               ->- (t2 ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t1) ->- t2 ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t
  281 
  282 cCSB = CLeaf "CSB" (Func $ \f ->
  283                 Func $ \g -> 
  284                 Func $ \x1 ->
  285                 Func $ \x2 ->
  286                 Func $ \x3 ->
  287                 (f <+> x2 <+> x3   ) <+> (g <+> x1 <+> x2) ) tp
  288      where tp = (t4 ->- t1 ->- t2 ->- t) ->- (t3 ->- t4 ->- t2) ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t1 ->- t
  289 
  290 cCSC = CLeaf "CSC" (Func $ \f ->
  291                 Func $ \g -> 
  292                 Func $ \x1 ->
  293                 Func $ \x2 ->
  294                 Func $ \x3 ->
  295                 (f <+> x2    ) <+> (g <+> x1 <+> x2 <+> x3) ) tp
  296      where tp = (t3 ->- t1 ->- t) ->- (t2 ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t1) ->- t2 ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t
  297 
  298 cCBS = CLeaf "CBS" (Func $ \f ->
  299                 Func $ \g -> 
  300                 Func $ \x1 ->
  301                 Func $ \x2 ->
  302                 Func $ \x3 ->
  303                 (f <+> x2 <+> x3) <+> (g <+> x1  <+> x3) ) tp
  304      where tp = (t1 ->- t4 ->- t2 ->- t) ->- (t3 ->- t4 ->- t2) ->- t3 ->- t1 ->- t4 ->- t
  305 
  306 cCBB = CLeaf "CBB" (Func $ \f ->
  307                 Func $ \g -> 
  308                 Func $ \x1 ->
  309                 Func $ \x2 ->
  310                 Func $ \x3 ->
  311                 (f <+> x2 <+> x3) <+> (g <+> x1) ) tp
  312      where tp = (t1 ->- t2 ->- t3 ->- t) ->- (t4 ->- t3) ->- t4 ->- t1 ->- t2 ->- t
  313 
  314 cCBC = CLeaf "CBC" (Func $ \f ->
  315                 Func $ \g -> 
  316                 Func $ \x1 ->
  317                 Func $ \x2 ->
  318                 Func $ \x3 ->
  319                 (f <+> x2 ) <+> (g <+> x1 <+> x3) ) tp
  320      where tp = (t1 ->- t2 ->- t) ->- (t3 ->- t4 ->- t2) ->- t3 ->- t1 ->- t4 ->- t
  321 
  322 cCCS = CLeaf "CCS" (Func $ \f ->
  323                 Func $ \g -> 
  324                 Func $ \x1 ->
  325                 Func $ \x2 ->
  326                 Func $ \x3 ->
  327                 (f <+> x3 ) <+> (g <+> x1 <+> x2 <+> x3) ) tp
  328      where tp = (t4 ->- t1 ->- t) ->- (t2 ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t1) ->- t2 ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t
  329 
  330 cCCB = CLeaf "CCB" (Func $ \f ->
  331                 Func $ \g -> 
  332                 Func $ \x1 ->
  333                 Func $ \x2 ->
  334                 Func $ \x3 ->
  335                 (f <+> x3 ) <+> (g <+> x1 <+> x2 ) ) tp
  336      where tp = (t1 ->- t2 ->- t) ->- (t3 ->- t4 ->- t2) ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t1 ->- t
  337 
  338 cCCC = CLeaf "CCC" (Func $ \f ->
  339                 Func $ \g -> 
  340                 Func $ \x1 ->
  341                 Func $ \x2 ->
  342                 Func $ \x3 ->
  343                 (f ) <+> (g <+> x1 <+> x2 <+> x3) ) tp
  344      where tp = (t1 ->- t) ->- (t2 ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t1) ->- t2 ->- t3 ->- t4 ->- t
  345 
  346 ternaryRouters = [cSSS
  347                  , cSSB
  348                  , cSSC
  349                  , cSBS
  350                  , cSBB
  351                  , cSBC
  352                  , cSCS
  353                  , cSCB
  354                  , cSCC
  355                  , cBSS
  356                  , cBSB
  357                  , cBSC
  358                  , cBBS
  359                  , cBBB
  360                  , cBBC
  361                  , cBCS
  362                  , cBCB
  363                  , cBCC
  364                  , cCSS
  365                  , cCSB
  366                  , cCSC
  367                  , cCBS
  368                  , cCBB
  369                  , cCBC
  370                  , cCCS
  371                  , cCCB
  372                  , cCCC]
